How to install ASF¶

Install from Github¶

To compile the script.py file you can clone the git repository from a terminal with by typing this :

$ git clone https://github.com/trntino/Project

Install from¶

$ pip install -i

Requirements¶

For the package to work properly, you will need to install some additional packages. The requirements.txt file lists all necessary packages.

numba==0.51.2
scipy==1.5.2
imageio==2.9.0
matplotlib==3.3.2
numpy==1.19.2
ipython==7.22.0
download
